title: surface-sphere-triangular-patches
description:
DIVIDE STANDARD SPHERE INTO PATCHES.

Divide the given undistorted sphere into equally-sized triangular patches.  Patches overlap by a border of 1 vertex.

sphere.description: an undistorted, regularly divided icosahedral sphere

divisions.description: how many pieces to divide each icosahedral edge into, must divide perfectly into the given sphere

text-out.description: output - text file for the vertex numbers of the patches
